    "visual_description": "A person is walking a dog in a park at night. The lighting is dim, with some streetlights visible. Trees are in the background. The person is wearing a dark shirt and shorts.",
    "characters": ["Man 1", "Dog"],
    "dialogue": "אה, אה, אה, אה,",
    "mood_tone": "Casual, ambient",
    "keywords": ["park", "night", "dog", "walking", "outdoors"],
    "frame_path": "uploads/session_id/frames/frame_0001_t0.0s.jpg"
  },
  {
    "scene_number": 2,
    "timestamp": "00:13 - 00:32",
    "time_sec": 13.0,
    "location": "Park",
    "visual_description": "A man is standing in a park at night, talking on his phone. He is wearing a maroon t-shirt and dark shorts. The background shows trees and dim lighting.",
    "characters": ["יצקו"],
    "dialogue": "כן. היי, עצקו, מה קורה אחי? ככה הרבה זמן לחזורה. כן, סורי, אולי, עם דברים על הראש. מה, על מרצי תלדבר? מה, אתה עם הכלבה עכשיו? כן, אני מרדן, הטיול על לי, את יודעת. על מרצי תלדבר? עצקו?",
    "mood_tone": "Conversational, slightly apologetic",
    "keywords": ["park", "night", "phone call", "conversation", "dog owner"],
    "frame_path": "uploads/session_id/frames/frame_0002_t13.0s.jpg"
  },
  {
    "scene_number": 3,
    "timestamp": "00:32 - 01:15",
    "time_sec": 32.0,
    "location": "Park",
    "visual_description": "A man is sitting on a bench in a park at night, looking frustrated while talking on his phone. He is wearing a red t-shirt. The background is dark with some blurred lights.",
    "characters": ["Man 1"],
    "dialogue": "איזה שהיא תנתקנו. אה... תדבר איתי, ביי. אתה היה זהו, לא מדברת אותו. למה? מה קנו? נשבר לי, אחי. כל פשוט נתקשר אליו, הוא אומר, אני אחזור אלך בלילה. למה? למה? כן, טוב. לא רק שום את האלה עם הכלבה שלו, בלילה. אתה קולט. אני חבר הכלבה. אתה מה? חבר הכלבה, נו.",
    "mood_tone": "Frustrated, annoyed",
    "keywords": ["park", "night", "phone call", "frustration", "disa
